title: Application of a Machine Learning Framework for Predicting Carbon Emissions in Bridge Design Stages

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and engineering design concepts, with fundamental computer application skills
context.additional_context: Learners must make strategic decisions as administrators/leaders regarding sustainable infrastructure design. Requires practice-centered learning utilizing actual project data

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the correlation between bridge design parameters and carbon emissions.
Learners can interpret machine learning model predictions using SHAP and PDP-ICE techniques.
Learners can predict carbon emissions for bridge projects using the GBRT model and propose optimization strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
